quote: She did not begin to tell real lies until Rosa was in hospital suffering that filthy rot that left her all eaten out inside, as light and fragile as a pine log infested with white ant
quote_letters: SHE DID NOT BEGIN TO TELL REAL LIES UNTIL ROSA WAS IN HOSPITAL SUFFERING THAT FILTHY ROT THAT LEFT HER ALL EATEN OUT INSIDE AS LIGHT AND FRAGILE AS A PINE LOG INFESTED WITH WHITE ANT
